column5: This is Manitoba Canadas Premier Tournament with a payout of over $100,000 in cash and Prizes.it will be held October 13/14,the entree is $1000.00 per team meaning Two people on a boat.We presently have 50% in entrees.If anyone needs form contact me KIM WILSON Area CODE 204-367-8442 leave a message or Email at [email protected] is going to be a Great One.
